Job Title: Inventory Control Specialist 1st Shift

Location: Princeton, KY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Brief Description

Inventory Control Specialist 1st shift at Hydro-Gear’s Princeton KY plant

Hydro-Gear is a world leader in the design and production of precision drive solutions, serving multiple industries and delivering to customers worldwide. Our passion is innovation and a commitment to making our customers successful. Learn more about us at Hydro-Gear.com.

Responsibilities: The Inventory Control Specialist is responsible for inventory accuracy by uncovering and investigating discrepancies using financial analysis and investigative techniques. This includes identifying failures of systems and processes in an effort to minimize unaccounted shrinkage of inventory.

Job Type: Full-Time located in Princeton KY

Salary: Commensurate with experience

Benefits

Paid Time Off (PTO) combines vacation, sick, personal days for flexibility of time offPaid HolidaysRelocation AssistanceRetirement Plans Medical, Dental, Vision InsuranceHealth & Wellness Program BenefitsTuition Reimbursement

Core Responsibilities Of Inventory Control Specialist

Conducts inspections of inventory records to identify potential discrepancies and errorsImplement forensic accounting techniques to analyze and interpret inventory dataDevelop and implement strategies to prevent and detect inventory-related errorsCollaborate with cross-functional teams to establish effective internal controlsUse advanced data analysis tools to examine inventory transactions Investigate and resolve discrepancies between physical inventory and recorded system levelsPrepare detail reports documenting findings and recommended actionsMinimum 2 years of experience in inventory control/inventory managementExperience in managing RM, WIP, FG inventoriesEffective communication skills to provide training and guidance to staff on best practicesExcellent attention to detail

Summary: Are you one that is willing to do what it takes to ensure inspections are handled safely and accurately? An Inventory Controls Specialist is a key position that is established to drive Hydro-Gear forward. The individual in this role has the ability to truly make a difference and inspire. Apply if you have experience in Manufacturing as an Inventory Specialist, Inventory Analyst, Logistics Specialist, Inventory Clerk, Logistics Cycle Counters, etc.

Requirements

High school/GED with minimum 2 years Manufacturing experienceMinimum 2 years of experience in inventory control/inventory managementExperience in managing RM, WIP, FG inventoriesEffective communication skills to provide training and guidance to staff on best practicesExcellent attention to detail

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
